Package com.tloj.game.entities.bosses

Class EvenBoss

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.Mob
com.tloj.game.entities.Boss
com.tloj.game.entities.bosses.EvenBoss
public class EvenBoss extends Boss
Represents the EvenBoss, called Cyfartal, boss entity in the game.
The EvenBoss is the first boss of the game. It has a special ability that nullifies received damage is weapon roll is even
It has 50 health points, 6 attack points, 2 defense points, 10 dice faces, 30 experience points drop, 20 money drop. This boss is paired with the DodgeEvenRoll ability and the WeaponShard drop.
